attributes.action: Allow the Afghan Chevening scholars into the UK
attributes.additional_details: It’s morally the right thing to do. These people have earned this, and for it to be gifted then taken away in such terrible circumstances for them is an outrage.
attributes.background: The UK government has recently announced it will not be allowing the already chosen Afghan Chevening scholars into UK due to administrational issues. Afghanistan is facing a massive humanitarian crisis. The decision not to allow these people into the the UK is both shameful and cowardly.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/594938
